definitions.definition: A superficial or shallow knowledge of a subject.
definitions.example: She knows a smattering of Greek, but not enough to carry on a conversation.

definitions.definition: A small number or amount of something.
definitions.example: There’s only a smattering of people who oppose the first amendment.

definitions.definition: To talk superficially; to babble, chatter.
To speak (a language) with spotty or superficial knowledge.
To study or approach superficially; to dabble in.
To have a slight taste, or a slight, superficial knowledge, of anything; to smack.
A scornful or mocking remark; a jeer or mockery
To make fun of (someone); to goad (a person) into responding, often in an aggressive manner.
Any pain or ache in the back.
In a stealthy manner, furtively.
A room designated as a place to eat lunch.
definitions.example: Company policy was to eat snacks only in the lunchroom.

definitions.definition: A diner or small restaurant that serves lunch.
definitions.example: I don't know how they stay in business serving only lunch, but the lunchroom on the corner is cheap and fast so I like it.

definitions.definition: To grow ripe; to become mature (said of grain, fruit, flowers etc.)
definitions.example: Grapes ripen in the sun.

definitions.definition: To approach or come to perfection.
To cause to mature; to make ripe
definitions.example: The warm sun ripened the corn.

definitions.definition: To mature; to fit or prepare; to bring to perfection
definitions.example: ripen the judgment

definitions.definition: The strawberry tree (Arbutus unedo).
Any of three local relatives:
The property of being clever.
Something clever, or done cleverly.
To tie (something) with rope.
definitions.example: The robber roped the victims.

definitions.definition: To throw a rope (or something similar, e.g. a lasso, cable, wire, etc.) around (something).
definitions.example: The cowboy roped the calf.

definitions.definition: To be formed into rope; to draw out or extend into a filament or thread.
To commit suicide.
definitions.example: My life is a mess; I might as well rope.

definitions.definition: A magician or wizard, sometimes specifically male.
A subdivision of currency, equal to one hundredth of a Romanian leu.
A subdivision of currency, equal to one hundredth of a Moldovan leu.
A loud, ringing sound, like that made by free-hanging metal objects striking each other.
Quality of tone.
The cry of some birds, including the crane and the goose.
A word or phrase linked only by sound and not by meaning, characteristic of some mental disorders.
Any periodic sound, especially one composed of a fundamental and harmonics, as opposed to simple periodic sounds (sine tones).
To strike (objects) together so as to produce a clang.
To give out a clang; to resound.
The process of adapting something or becoming adapted to a situation; adjustment, modification.
A change that is made or undergone to suit a condition or environment.
The process of change that an organism undergoes to be better suited to its environment.
An instance of an organism undergoing change, or the structure or behavior that is changed.
The process of adapting an artistic work from a different medium.
(authorship) An artistic work that has been adapted from a different medium.
Inflammation of the kidney.
A thing on which something turns; specifically a metal pointed pin or short shaft in machinery, such as the end of an axle or spindle.
(by extension) Something or someone having a paramount significance in a certain situation.
Act of turning on one foot.
The officer or soldier who simply turns in his place while the company or line moves around him in wheeling.
A player with responsibility for co-ordinating their team in a particular jam.
An element of a set to be sorted that is chosen as a midpoint, so as to divide the other elements into two groups to be dealt with recursively.
A pivot table.
Any of a row of captioned elements used to navigate to subpages, rather like tabs.
An element of a matrix that is used as a focus for row operations, such as dividing the row by the pivot, or adding multiples of the row to other rows making all other values in the pivot column 0.
A quarterback.
A shift during a general election in a political candidate's messaging to reflect plans and values more moderate than those advocated during the primary.
A powered saw whose blade is a continuous band of metal with teeth along one edge.
To cut with a bandsaw.
The thin, horny, transparent plate covering the upper surface of the end of a toe.
To fasten two pieces of lumber together by applying nails or screws into both boards at an angle.
: A person who legally resides in a particular place.
definitions.example: Joe travels all over the country, but he is a domiciliary of New York.

definitions.definition: Of or relating to a domicile
Any of a board of municipal officers elected to manage some New England towns.
To give off light from heat or to emit light as if heated.
definitions.example: The fire was still glowing after ten hours.

definitions.definition: To radiate some emotional quality like light.
definitions.example: The zealots glowed with religious fervor.

definitions.definition: To gaze especially passionately at something.
To radiate thermal heat.
definitions.example: After their workout, the gymnasts' faces were glowing red.

definitions.definition: To shine brightly and steadily.
definitions.example: The new baby's room glows with bright, loving colors.

definitions.definition: To make hot; to flush.
To feel hot; to have a burning sensation, as of the skin, from friction, exercise, etc.; to burn.
A ballroom dance in 3/4 time.
A piece of music for this dance (or in triple time).
A simple task.
Not directed
Illuminated by sunlight.
The act of rediscovering
A second or subsequent discovery of the same thing
To affirm to be correct, true, or genuine.
definitions.example: When will the appraiser attest the date of the painting?

definitions.definition: To certify by signature or oath.
definitions.example: You must attest your will in order for it to be valid.

definitions.definition: To certify in an official capacity.
To supply or be evidence of.
definitions.example: Her fine work attested her ability.

definitions.definition: To put under oath.
To call to witness; to invoke.
To burn the surface of, to scorch.
definitions.example: The sun today could parch cement.

definitions.definition: To roast, as dry grain.
To dry to extremity; to shrivel with heat.
definitions.example: The patient's mouth is parched from fever.

definitions.definition: To make thirsty.
definitions.example: We're parched, hon. Could you send up an ale from the cooler?

definitions.definition: To boil something slowly (Still used in Lancashire in parched peas, a type of mushy peas).
To become superficially burnt; be become sunburned.
definitions.example: The locals watched, amused, as the tourists parched in the sun, having neglected to apply sunscreen or bring water.

definitions.definition: Dry.
Very thirsty.
Favouring peace rather than conflict; not aggressive, tending to avoid violence (of people, actions etc.).
Characterized by peace; peaceful, tranquil.
To replace the face or surface of something; to create a new outer layer.
definitions.example: They decided to reface their cabinets, putting new doors and fresh paint just on the fronts.

definitions.definition: The act of overdrawing a bank account.
The amount overdrawn.
definitions.example: I have an overdraft of £1234.

definitions.definition: The maximum amount that may be overdrawn.
definitions.example: The bank have given me an overdraft of $2000.

definitions.definition: The extraction of groundwater from an aquifer beyond the safe yield or equilibrium yield.
A series of flues in a furnace; the current of air forced through them.
A small mammal, of the family Erinaceidae or subfamily Erinaceinae (spiny hedgehog, the latter characterized by their spiny back and often by the habit of rolling up into a ball when attacked.)
Any of several spiny mammals, such as the porcupine, that are similar to the hedgehog.
A type of moveable military barricade made from crossed logs or steel bars, laced with barbed wire, used to damage or impede tanks and vehicles; Czech hedgehog.

A spigot mortar-type of depth charge weapon from World War II that simultaneously fires a number of explosives into the water to create a pattern of underwater explosions intended to attack submerged submarines.
A type of chocolate cake (or slice), somewhat similar to an American brownie.
A form of dredging machine.
Certain flowering plants with parts resembling a member of family Erinaceidae
The edible fungus Hydnum repandum.
A kind of electrical transformer with open magnetic circuit, the ends of the iron wire core being turned outward and presenting a bristling appearance.
A way of serving food at a party, consisting of a half melon or potato etc. with individual cocktail sticks of cheese and pineapple stuck into it.
To make use of a hedgehog barricade as a defensive maneuver.
To array with spiky projections like the quills of a hedgehog.
To curl up into a defensive ball.
A unit of a poem, written or printed as a paragraph; equivalent to a verse.
An apartment or division in a building.
An XML element which acts as basic unit of meaning in XMPP.
A segment; a portion of a broadcast devoted to a particular topic.
A period; an interval into which a sporting event is divided.
One who rigs or dresses; as:
A part of a rowing boat's equipment used to provide leverage for a rowing blade or oar around a fixed fulcrum.
A cylindrical pulley or drum in machinery.
A plastic bottle of beer, typically between 1 L to 2.5 L volume.
A long, slender, pointed sable paintbrush for making fine lines, etc.; said to be so called from its use for drawing the lines of the rigging of ships.
Any of various projecting beams or spars that provide support for a sailing ship's mast.
A long thin timber, pontoon, or other float attached parallel to a canoe or boat by projecting struts as a means of preventing tipping or capsizing.
An outrigger canoe or boat.
An iron bracket or brace for an oarlock projecting from the side of a rowing boat.
An extension mechanism, often retractable when not in use, on a boat, vehicle, or structure which helps to stabilize it to keep it from tipping over.

A type of ski pole, with skis attached at the bottom, instead of the spike/pick found on a normal pole. It is used in downhill skiing variants of para-skiing, especially those that use a sit-ski, such as the monoski.

Loose terminology for species in the Anopheles genus of mosquitoes, some of which may transmit various parasites, Plasmodium, that are the cause of malaria. More strictly speaking, as Anopheles is a proper name it should be capitalised.
Either of a pair of small masses of lymphoid tissue that lie on each side of the throat and that help protect the body against infection; palatine tonsil.
Any of various small masses of lymphoid tissues, including palatine tonsils, adenoids and lingual tonsils.
The uvula.
To make furious or mad with anger; to fill with fury.
Extremely angry.
(Muslim demonology) A genie and descendant of the jann, normally invisible to the human eye, but who may also appear in animal or human form, equivalent to demons in Jewish demonology.
A species which reproduces by asexual rather than sexual reproduction, or a member of such a species.
A person who does not experience sexual attraction; a person who lacks interest in or desire for sex.
Something which does not have a sex, or a word which refers to such a thing.
Nonsexual in nature, unmarked by sexual activity. (Compare Platonic.)
Not experiencing sexual attraction; lacking interest in or desire for sex.
Lacking distinct sex, lacking sexual organs.
Without sexual action; reproducing by some other method than sex.
(collective) A group of geese when they are on the ground or on the water.
(by extension) Any group or gathering of related things.
To make a noise like a goose; to cackle.
Small flat-bottomed fishing boat suitable for launching from a beach, found on the north-east coast of England and in Scotland.
The hallmark sound of a fretless bass guitar played with a certain technique, where treble frequencies increase gradually after the attack.
definitions.example: Play it again, but with more mwah this time.

definitions.definition: The sound of a kiss to indicate blowing a kiss to someone.
definitions.example: Thanks guys. 3 kisses for you all: mwah mwah mwah!

definitions.definition: To (cause to) get off (something).

definitions.definition: To make (a mounted drive) unavailable for use.
To come down; to descend.
To throw (cannon) off their carriages.
Having gotten off one's horse, or been removed from its usual mounting, as with a statue off its pedestal, a framed picture from a wall, or a chandelier hanging from a ceiling.
Cool, nice.

The traditional dress of women in the Indian Subcontinent; an outer garment consisting of a single length of cotton or silk, most often with one end wrapped around the waist to form a skirt, the other draped over the shoulder or head.
To vary irregularly; to swing.
To undulate.
To be irresolute; to waver.

definitions.definition: To cause to vary irregularly.
The state or characteristic of being dormant; quiet, inactive restfulness.
An increase in the severity of something (such as a disease)
A mythical beast having the body of a lion and the wings and head of an eagle.

A person who has just arrived from Europe.
A cadet newly arrived in British India: half English, half Indian.
A watchful guardian, especially a duenna in charge of a young woman.
Not similar or congruent; not matching or fitting in.
Of two numbers, with respect to a third, such that their difference can not be divided by it without a remainder.
definitions.example: 20 and 25 are incongruous with respect to 4.

definitions.definition: The workload of a person or group that handles cases; the relative volume of cases expected to be worked upon.

definitions.definition: Having a benevolent, courteous, friendly, generous, gentle, liberal, sympathetic, or warm-hearted nature or disposition, marked by consideration for – and service to – others.
Affectionate.

definitions.definition: Favorable.
Mild, gentle, forgiving
definitions.example: The years have been kind to Richard Gere; he ages well.

definitions.definition: Gentle; tractable; easily governed.
definitions.example: a horse kind in harness

definitions.definition: Characteristic of the species; belonging to one's nature; natural; native.
To become involved in a situation, so as to alter or prevent an action.
definitions.example: The police had to be called to intervene in the fight.

definitions.definition: To occur, fall, or come between, points of time, or events.
definitions.example: An instant intervened between the flash and the report.

definitions.definition: To occur or act as an obstacle or delay.
definitions.example: Nothing intervened to prevent the undertaking.

definitions.definition: To say (something) in the middle of a conversation or discussion between other people, or to respond to a situation involving other people.
To come between, or to be between, persons or things.
definitions.example: The Mediterranean intervenes between Europe and Africa.

definitions.definition: In a suit to which one has not been made a party, to put forward a defense of one's interest in the subject matter.
definitions.example: an application for leave (i.e. permission) to intervene

definitions.definition: The period around Christmas; the Christmas season, Christmastime; specifically, Christmas itself.

(dated, or Germanic Neo-Paganism) The period of celebration of a pre-Christian festival associated with the (northern) winter solstice, later absorbed into the festival of Christmas (but sometimes recreated by modern neo-pagans).
The period of southern winter in the middle of the year, sometimes celebrated in the colder, snowy regions of Australia with allusions to Christmas, which originated as a marketing gimmick.

Any system of pipes or tubes; piping

A monocle.

The hinged cover over the engine of a motor car; a hood.
A length of canvas attached to a fore-and-aft sail to increase the pulling power.

Anything resembling a bonnet (hat) in shape or use.

Having panels.

That generates, or employs, multiple alternating current supplies with the same voltage but different phase angles

definitions.definition: The quality of being militant.
The presence of one or more disorders (or diseases) in addition to a primary disease or disorder.

A condom.

A book on palmistry; a system of palmistry.

An alluvial flat.
Unfledged (of a young bird).
(by extension) Immature, lacking in life experience.

Shallow or weak-willed.
(of a brick) Unburnt.

Located beneath the floor.

A jugular vein.

definitions.definition: Relating to, or located near, the neck or throat.

Relating to juggling.
An inflamed (raised and colored) spot on the surface of the skin that is usually painful and fills with pus.

To develop pimples
To protest, organized by a labour union, typically in front of the location of employment.

Of or pertaining to lack of attention; not paying attention; careless.

definitions.definition: Precedence.
definitions.example: But as it will not do to talk entirely at random, as Montaigne does, and Ralph Waldo Emerson tries to do, we must take up some little thread or threads. and string our thoughts thereupon, keeping up also a relation among them of precession and succession.

The slow gyration of the earth's axis around the pole of the ecliptic, caused mainly by the gravitational torque of the sun and moon.

A decorative covering or ornament worn on the head.
A hairdo.
To touch by means of a mutual border, edge or end; to border on; to lie adjacent (to); to be contiguous (said of an area of land)

Tannic acid or any of its derivatives.
Someone who rides a motorcycle
Praise or glorification.
Hymn of praise.
(in the plural, also Lauds) A prayer service following matins.
To praise, to glorify

A critic.

To deliver goods for a business directly to its customers, as though the business owned a relevant inventory, but with the manufacturer as the real source of the delivery.
definitions.example: If you drop ship the orders, then you don't need to own the products; thus, fewer of your customers suspect you're acting as a middle man.

definitions.definition: A form of government in which the governing body has absolute, or almost absolute, control. Typically this control is maintained by force, and little heed is paid to public opinion or the judicial system.
A loose-fitting protective garment worn over other clothing.
To act contrary to an order; to fail to conform to a regulation or obligation.
To deny the truth of something.
Sexual intercourse or other sexual activity, especially if illicit.
definitions.example: I came home early and caught them on the couch having a bit of nookie.

definitions.definition: A pacifier.
To mark, cut or shape something to specified dimensions.
A shop selling perfumes.
A factory where perfume is made.
The manufacture of perfume.
Land that is suitable for farming and agricultural production.
A chime constructed from tubes, rods, bells, etc. made of wood, glass, metal or ceramic, suspended outside a building in such a way that they tinkle pleasantly when moved by the wind.
An intensely spicy chili pepper, Capsicum chinense.
In a prudent manner.
To be able to see beforehand: to anticipate; predict.
To provide.
A type of soldier who is trained to enter combat zones by parachuting from aircraft.
The vertical edge of a sail that is closest to the direction of the wind.
definitions.example: By easing the halyard, the luff of the sail was made to sag to leeward.

definitions.definition: The act of sailing a ship close to the wind.
The roundest part of a ship's bow.
The forward or weather leech of a sail, especially of the jib, spanker, and other fore-and-aft sails.
(of a sail) To shake due to being trimmed improperly.
(of a boat) To alter course to windward so that the sails luff. (Alternatively luff up)
To let out (a sail) so that it luffs.
To alter the vertical angle of the jib of a crane so as to bring it level with the load.
A situation where an opponent's ball is directly in the way of one's own ball and the hole, on the putting green (abolished 1952).
(by extension) An obstacle or obstruction.
To thwart or stump; to cause to fail or to leave hopelessly puzzled, confused, or stuck.
definitions.example: If writing dates has you stymied at times, it is probably for one of two reasons. https//www.grammarly.com/blog/how-to-write-dates/

definitions.definition: To bring into the position of, or impede by, a stymie.
In a hilarious manner; so as to amuse greatly.
definitions.example: a hilariously funny joke

definitions.definition: With great hilarity or mirth.
definitions.example: They laughed hilariously at the comedy film.

definitions.definition: A woman given to undue belligerence or ill manner at the slightest provocation.
A woman who is scolding, domineering, or highly opinionated.
A woman who is rough, loud, and aggressive.
Either of two plants of the Asteraceae family.
A coffee substitute made from the roasted roots of the common chicory, sometimes used as a cheap adulterant in real coffee.
The layer of earth that is below the topsoil.
To turn up the subsoil of.
To separate the grain from the straw or husks (chaff) by mechanical beating, with a flail or machinery.
To beat soundly, usually with some tool such as a stick or whip; to drub.
To act as a patron of; to defend, protect, or support.
To make oneself a customer of a business, especially a regular customer.
To assume a tone of unjustified superiority toward; to talk down to, to treat condescendingly.
To blame, to reproach.
Offensively condescending.
In good enough shape to be shown or offered to other people; tidy; attractive.
definitions.example: Before we go out, let me just go to the washroom and make myself presentable.

definitions.definition: Capable of being presented to a church living.
A variety of dry white wine from this region
Cause to become one; make into a unit; consolidate; merge; combine.
Become one.
To turn pale; to lose colour.
To become insignificant.
To make pale; to diminish the brightness of.
To enclose with pales, or as if with pales; to encircle or encompass; to fence off.
A wooden stake; a picket.
Fence made from wooden stake; palisade.
(by extension) Limits, bounds (especially before of).
The bounds of morality, good behaviour or judgment in civilized company, in the phrase beyond the pale.
A vertical band down the middle of a shield.
A territory or defensive area within a specific boundary or under a given jurisdiction.
The jurisdiction (territorial or otherwise) of an authority.
A cheese scoop.
A shore for bracing a timber before it is fastened.
To make shorter; to abbreviate.
To become shorter.
To make deficient (as to); to deprive (of).
To make short or friable, as pastry, with butter, lard, etc.
To reduce or diminish in amount, quantity, or extent; to lessen.
definitions.example: to shorten an allowance of food

definitions.definition: To take in the slack of (a rope).
To reduce (sail) by taking it in.
The projection of a mammary gland from which, on female mammals, milk is secreted.
Something resembling a teat, such as a small protuberance or nozzle.
An artificial nipple used for bottle-feeding infants.
A raised platform in a room for a high table, a seat of honour, a throne, or other dignified occupancy; a similar platform supporting a lectern, pulpit, etc., which may be used to speak from.
A bench, a settle, a pew.
An elevated table in a hall at which important people were seated; a high table.
The canopy over an altar, etc.
A cake containing dried fruits and, optionally, nuts, citrus peel and spice.
A crazy or eccentric person.
A homosexual male.
Pompous; snobbish; inclined to turn up one's nose
definitions.example: He left out Town & Country, the magazine for snooty East Coast liberals. http//www.newsbusters.org/blogs/nb/tim-graham/2018/10/12/jack-shafer-mocks-biased-beto-buzz

definitions.definition: Elite; exclusive
definitions.example: Her parties were snooty affairs; custom-designed cocktail dresses that cost more than a decent luxury car were de rigueur.

definitions.definition: The belief that a society or system should be run by an elite.
The superior attitude or behaviour associated with an elite.
Pertaining to, or connected with, a fetus.
definitions.example: fetal circulation

definitions.definition: A large tuba whose coils fit around the player's shoulders.
A low-frequency electromagnetic wave observed in various plasmas.
A decoration; that which adorns.
definitions.example: The draperies did little to keep out the light; rather, they were mainly there as adornment for the windows.

definitions.definition: The act of decorating.
To make something happen suddenly and quickly.
definitions.example: it precipitated their success

definitions.definition: To throw an object or person from a great height.
To send violently into a certain state or condition.
definitions.example: we were precipitated into a conflict

definitions.definition: To come out of a liquid solution into solid form.
definitions.example: Adding the acid will cause the salt to precipitate.

definitions.definition: To separate a substance out of a liquid solution into solid form.
To have water in the air fall to the ground, for example as rain, snow, sleet, or hail; be deposited as condensed droplets.
definitions.example: It will precipitate tomorrow, but we don't know whether as rain or snow.

definitions.definition: To cause (water in the air) to condense or fall to the ground.
To fall headlong.
To act too hastily; to be precipitous.
Any of the cells in the liver responsible for the metabolism of protein, carbohydrate and lipid and for detoxification.
A scientist who studies insects.
definitions.example: The noted entomologist Charles W. Woodworth suggested the use of Drosophila melanogaster for genetic studies.

definitions.definition: An event at which people (often children) wash cars, often for a small fee or donation
A place at which a car is washed, usually for a fee and often mechanically by driving the car through a tunnel.
definitions.example: I'm going to take the car to the car wash.

definitions.definition: An instance of washing a car, especially such a place.
definitions.example: I'm going to take the car in for a car wash.
